text: Hey Dad…tell us about your trip to the jungle”
“You went into the jungle?
“What did you see?”
“Did you see any animals?”

Walkin’ in the jungle, what did I see?
A tiny reed frog blinkin' at me!

I said, "hey!" She said, “Ribit!" 
We chatted like that for 'bout a minute

All of a sudden she spied a cricket
And disappeared, man, lickity-splicket!

Walkin'---in the jungle
Walkin'---in the jungle

Walkin'---in the jungle
So many critters to meet!
Skippin' through the jungle and what did I see?
A family of chimpanzees!

I said, "Hi!", they replied, HOO-HOO!
Gave 'em berries and they said, "Thank you!"

Sisters, uncles, aunts, and brothers
Soon began to groom each other!

Skippin'---in the jungle
Skippin'---in the jungle

Skippin'---in the jungle
So many critters to meet!

Circling the pond, I began to laugh
I came upon elephants takin' a bath!

Mama sprayed water all over her calf
They played and trumpeted, splished and splashed!
Look! I got photographs
wow!
Nothin like elephants takin' a bath!

Splashin'---in the jungle
Splashin'---in the jungle

Splashin'---in the jungle
So many critters to meet!

I was creepin' by the river in the jungle and found
A hungry ‘gator glidin’ around
Oh, no!
He caught my eye!

I turned invisible just in time!
Mystified, he swam away
Searchin’ for some other prey!
(Phew!)

Creepin'---in the jungle
Creepin'---in the jungle

Creepin'---in the jungle
So many critters to meet!

Sh!  Look! Lions, snakes
Hippopotami,
Goodness sakes!

Sh!  Look! Giraffes! Babboons!
Aardvarks
And gorillas too!

Tell me, kids, were you aware
Of all the species living there?

Dancin’—in the jungle
Dancin’---in the jungle

Dancin’---in the jungle
So many critters to meet!

Dancin’—in the jungle
Dancin’---in the jungle

Dancin’---in the jungle
So many critters to meet!

Dancin’—in the jungle
Dancin’---in the jungle

Dancin’---in the jungle
So many critters to meet!
Phew!!!
